import React, { useState } from 'react' import './qa.css' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Forma from '../../Components/Main/Forma/Forma' import Capib from '../mobile/capabilities' function Audit() { const imageQa = useSelector(state => state.menuBar.imageQa) const arrow = useSelector(state => state.menuBar.arrowFaq) const techList = useSelector(state => state.menuBar.techListQa) const tryList = useSelector(state => state.menuBar.tryListQa) const faqSection = useSelector(state => state.menuBar.faqSectionMl) const [arrow_1, setArrow] = useState(0) const [arrow_2, setArrow_2] = useState(true) const handleArrow = (id) => { if (arrow_1 === id && arrow_2) { setArrow(null) setArrow_2(false) } else { setArrow(id) setArrow_2(true) } } return ( <>

Аудит

Комплексное исследование продукта: от дизайна до кода.

Зачем он вам нужен?
